com.liliya.quiz.model

Interface PlayerQuizInstance

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayerQuizInstanceImpl

    public interface PlayerQuizInstance
    Player Quiz Instance represents every instance of a quiz played by a player It reflects the many to many relationship between players and quizzes Each instance is denoted by its total score and whether the player is actively playing or not

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Player getPlayer()
      Retrieves the player in this instance
      Quiz getQuiz()
      Retrieves the quiz in the instance
      int getTotalScore()
      Returns the total score for this particular attempt of the player
      boolean isQuizPlayed()
      Denotes if the quiz is currently being played or not Used to control closing quizzes which are actively played
      void setPlayer(Player player)
      Sets the Player in the instance
      void setQuiz(Quiz quiz)
      Sets the quiz in the instance
      void setQuizPlayed(boolean quizPlayed)
      Sets a quiz as an actively played by the player for this instance to prevent the quiz from being closed
      void setTotalScore(int score)
      Sets the total score for this player and their current attempt, following a calculation of the score
